rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {2276, 3844, 4431, B6005, B6010} Do Permission required Otherwise true
Unit was previously coded {MBA631, MBA6310, MBA6310A, MBA6312, MKF5630%}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 11, 42, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MBA5906, MBA9006, MKF5461, MKF5916, MKX5461, MKX9160} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {MBA631, MBA6310, MBA6310A, MBA6312, MKF5630%}

description: An in-depth analysis of the marketing techniques that apply to service organisations and industries including service design and delivery, customer service, service quality measurement and internal marketing.
